metadata.title: CVE-2022-24763 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: PJSIP is a free and open source multimedia communication library written inthe C language. Versions 2.12 and prior contain a denial-of-servicevulnerability that affects PJSIP users that consume PJSIP's XML parsing intheir apps. Users are advised to update. There are no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: pjproject: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
